name: biologicalSample
displayName: Please provide a short description of your sample, e.g. Human Lin28A in complex with let7-d1 microRNA.

name: collectionDate
displayName: Please indicate the date this dataset was collected. This information can often be located in image headers, file timestamps, or your lab notebooks. If the exact date is unknown, please provide a best estimate.

name: subjectComposition
displayName: Please check all that apply. Include all types of molecules that are present in your sample. Ligands should indicate co-factors, inhibitors, or other biologically relevant small molecules.

name: reprocessingInstructions
displayName: Please provide special instructions for data re-processing, including critical parameters that are inaccurate in image headers, the detector type, additional merging instructions, etc. Some examples of critical information: 1) Beam center, as defined in image headers, needs to be corrected to X=150,Y170; 2) This is a low resolution dataset and needs to be combined with high res datasets to obtain complete coverage; 3) This dataset was indexed in space group P21, and 120 frames were processed with HKL2000 at 3.2A resolution.

name: collectionFacility
displayName: Name of the site where the data collection was performed.

name: refinedStructurePDBCode
displayName: Please provide a PDB code for the primary set of coordinates derived from this dataset.

name: refinedStructurePDBCodeComparable
displayName: Please provide a comparable PDB code for the primary set of coordinates derived from this dataset.
